nodes.name: stopInEmergency

nodes.name: verifyAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev Deployer address is made owner of contract and also given administrator status

@return The number of store owners.
nodes.name: getStoreOwnerCount

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the number of administrators

isAdministrator

@dev Grants given address merchant status and allows them to create stores.
@param _address Address of which to grant merchant status.
nodes.name: createStoreOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes merchant status from address.
@param _address Address of which to remove merchant status.
nodes.name: removeMerchant
isStoreOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns number of merchants.
@return Number of merchants in Marketplace
nodes.name: getNumberOfMerchants
getMerchantByArrayId

nodes.documentation: @dev Emergency stop function only callable by owner of contract
